title: What's destroying college sports?: Today's Toon
text:
CLOSE

Want to keep up with USA TODAY's cartoon updates? Bookmark this page. We'll update it frequently.

Would paying student athletes destroy college sports? Cartoonist Mike Thompson has a theory. To see it, look at the gallery above. For more cartoon commentary on the latest news, scroll through the rest of the daily editorial cartoons. Check back often for updates.

In fact, on this page, you'll find a bevy of cartoon galleries produced by artists from throughout the USA TODAY Network and from Cagle Cartoons — a site that archives some 200,000 cartoons from artists worldwide. We update our galleries regularly. And we'll try to swap them onto this page so you can enjoy the most recent additions to our collection as they come. Check back often!

Want more? Here's our cartoons front.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/cartoons/2019/02/28/best-editorial-cartoons-artists-worldwide/3007186002/
